page.title: 06Westfield Sports Centre
page.content: Westfield Sports Centre provides for the following activities: {SQUASH}3 courts available {BADMINTON}3 courts available {TABLE TENNIS}5 tables available {WEIGHT TRAINING}for over-14s only {FOOTBALL}2 floodlit all-weather pitches {TENNIS}during summer months only {TRAMPOLINE}one available {BASKETBALL}one court available {ROLLER-SKATING}up to 12 years only {KARATE}a club meets each Sunday {JUDO}a club meets each Friday {SELF-DEFENCE}a club meets each Wednesday. {SWIMMING}public bathing each day till 8p.m. {SPLASH SESSIONS}each Saturday and during school holidays.
